name: Werkgroep voor een Rechtvaardige en Verantwoorde Landbouw
goal: Wervel is a volunteer movement for healthy agriculture, aiming to 1/disseminate expertise with a holistic perspective on agriculture to press, academia, organisations (in order to do that, studies decisions with regard to agriculture on all policy levels);  2/ show how agroecology works (for instance agroforestry) through spotting pioneer innovations, networking and liaising with researchers and farmers 3/ empower communities around schools (parents, teachers, local catering companies, farmers) to work together to reclaim 'schoolmeals as commons' as they transform them into local, eco and fair.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Culture, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Agricultural and Rural Development policy
Environment policy
Climate policy
Food policy
